    • org.apache.giraph.examples中WorkerAggregatorUsage的使用

      实现WorkerAggregatorUsage的org.apache.giraph.examples中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AggregatorsTestVertex
      Vertex which uses aggrergators.
      class  ConnectedComponentsVertex
      Implementation of the HCC algorithm that identifies connected components and assigns each vertex its "component identifier" (the smallest vertex id in the component) The idea behind the algorithm is very simple: propagate the smallest vertex id along the edges to all vertices of a connected component.
      class  IdentityVertex<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      User applications can subclass IdentityVertex, which simply prints the results that have been read for testing IO related jobs under any inputformat
      class  PartitionContextTestVertex
      Vertex to test the functionality of PartitionContext
      static class  PartitionContextTestVertex.TestPartitionContextWorkerContext
      WorkerContext for TestPartitionContext
      class  RandomWalkVertex<E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Base class for executing a random walk on a graph
      class  RandomWalkWithRestartVertex
      Executes "RandomWalkWithRestart", a random walk on the graph which is biased towards a source vertex.
      class  RandomWalkWorkerContext
      Worker context for random walks.
      static class  SimpleCheckpointVertex.SimpleCheckpointComputation
      Actual computation.
      static class  SimpleCheckpointVertex.SimpleCheckpointVertexWorkerContext
      Worker context associated with SimpleCheckpointVertex.
      class  SimpleCombinerVertex
      Test whether messages can go through a combiner.
      class  SimpleFailVertex
      Vertex to allow unit testing of failure detection
      class  SimpleInDegreeCountVertex
      Simple function to return the out degree for each vertex.
      class  SimpleLongDoubleDoubleDoubleIdentityVertex
      A simple use of the Identity Vertex for taking care of Long, Double, Double, Double type Inputformat Good for use with io.LongDoubleDoubleAdjacencyListVertexInputFormat
      class  SimpleMasterComputeVertex
      Demonstrates a computation with a centralized part implemented via a MasterCompute.
      static class  SimpleMasterComputeVertex.SimpleMasterComputeWorkerContext
      Worker context used with SimpleMasterComputeVertex.
      class  SimpleMsgVertex
      Test whether messages can be sent and received by vertices.
      class  SimpleMutateGraphVertex
      Vertex to allow unit testing of graph mutations.
      static class  SimpleMutateGraphVertex.SimpleMutateGraphVertexWorkerContext
      Worker context used with SimpleMutateGraphVertex.
      class  SimpleOutDegreeCountVertex
      Simple function to return the out degree for each vertex.
      class  SimplePageRankVertex
      Demonstrates the basic Pregel PageRank implementation.
      static class  SimplePageRankVertex.SimplePageRankVertexWorkerContext
      Worker context used with SimplePageRankVertex.
      class  SimpleShortestPathsVertex
      Demonstrates the basic Pregel shortest paths implementation.
      class  SimpleSuperstepVertex
      Just a simple Vertex compute implementation that executes 3 supersteps, then finishes.
      class  SimpleTriangleClosingVertex
      Demonstrates triangle closing in simple, unweighted graphs for Giraph.
      static class  SimpleVertexWithWorkerContext.EmitterWorkerContext
      Example worker context to emit data as part of a superstep.
      static class  SimpleVertexWithWorkerContext.SimpleVertex
      Actual vetex implementation
      static class  VerifyMessage.VerifyMessageVertex
      Send and verify messages.

      interface  WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage
      WorkerAggregatorUsage which can be used in each of the computation threads.

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultWorkerContext
      A dummy implementation of WorkerContext.

      Handler for aggregators on worker.
      class  WorkerAggregatorHandler.ThreadLocalWorkerAggregatorUsage
      Not thread-safe implementation of WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage.
      class  WorkerContext
      WorkerContext allows for the execution of user code on a per-worker basis.
